=== What is a wiki? ===
A Huge web site where anyone can create and edit pages.

See some examples here: <nowiki>[[http://moinmoin.wikiwikiweb.de/|MoinMoin]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://www.wikipedia.com|Wikipedia]]</nowiki>

=== How to edit a this wiki ===
See the page HelpContents for some comprehensive yet simple documentation about how to use, navigate and edit this wiki. See also the WikiCourse for a step-by-step guide to the wiki.
